name: 6th Edition of Global Conference on Plant Science and Molecular Biology
content: We are pleased to invite you to our upcoming event “6th Edition of Global Conference on Plant Science and Molecular Biology” (GPMB 2021) to be held on September 30 – October 2, 2021 at Paris, France Plant Science 2021 is one stop source to discuss exchange and learn better approaches to understand latest and complex technologies and strategies in plant science. GPMB 2021 provides a forum for the exchange of information about new and significant research in Plant Science throughout the world. This 3 Day conference is composed various sessions with lectures on Plant Science, Plant Biology, Plant Biotechnology,
